mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT R.ROLE_CODE AS ID, R.ROLE_NAME AS NAME FROM SYS_USER_ROLE UR, SYS_ROLE R WHERE UR.ROLE_CODE = R.ROLE_CODE AND UR.USER_CODE =#{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT R.ROLE_CODE AS ID, R.ROLE_NAME AS NAME FROM SYS_AUTHORIZE A, SYS_MENU M, SYS_ROLE R WHERE A.ROLE_CODE = R.ROLE_CODE AND A.RESOURCE_ID = M.MENU_CODE AND M.MENU_URL = #{url}
